snippet: “Alpha House,” a political comedy written by Garry Trudeau, and the first original TV series from Amazon, follows four Republican senators who share a townhouse near the Capitol.
abstract: Alessandra Stanley reviews Alpha House, Amazon.com's first Web-original series, starring John Goodman and Bill Murray.
lead_paragraph: “Alpha House,” a political comedy written by Garry Trudeau, and the first original TV series from Amazon, follows four Republican senators who share a townhouse near the Capitol.

headline.seo: ‘Alpha House’ Is Garry Trudeau’s TV Comedy From Amazon
headline.main: Four Eccentric Senators as Capitol Hill Roomies
headline.print_headline: Four Eccentric Senators As Capitol Hill Roomies
